name: Ahmed Karmouch
content: Ahmed Karmouch Ahmed Karmouch Ph.D. Professor Research Interests: Network Slicing Software Defined Networks Named Data Networks. Programmable Data Plane Intelligence. In-Network Computing. Autonomic Networks. Ambient Intelligence & IoT. Cloud Computing.
